message: Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm offering it to you first.  I'm valuing it at $1,500,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my needs. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $1,200,000 for it. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate the offer, but the value of this product to you is undeniable. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,400,000. This is my final offer.

Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer carefully. While I understand the value of the product, I must stick to my budget. I am now offering $1,300,000 for the product. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're considering.
